Summary: Diamond-shaped object w/multiple green lights in A
divs: Sighting DetailsA couple and their daughter, driving in suburban Scottsdale, saw adiamong-shaped object with a concave, patterned underside and a pale green lightat each corner. The object approached from the NW and passed overhead as theyexited the auto to better observe. They attempted to follow it. The objectchanged direction multiple times (i.e., weaving pattern) before being lost fromview over nearby mountains. As it moved away, the object rotated so as to appearrectangular. The couple disagreed on the objects actual size but agreed on itsspeed (120-150 knots), physical description and path.
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Scottsdale
There were no other sightings in Scottsdale on or around June 28th 1999
